title: Flexible Science Learning Design Strategies for Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic scientific theories and practical experience in the field of science
context.additional_context: A course for in-service professionals to enhance scientific problem-solving skills and self-directed learning competencies. Project-based assessment conducted in an asynchronous learning environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can flexibly develop learning plans and apply time management strategies in remote environments
Learners can deepen their exploration of scientific topics using various LMS-based learning modules (videos, reading materials, discussion boards)
Learners can complete scientific projects (experimental design/analysis) through peer feedback and virtual collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
